content:
Riding waves upon waves we go,
Big ships towing little ones in tow,
Big carts pulling small ones behind,
Breaking through waves with the wind!
info: 采集山莓教学-开启前-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Ah, I-I mean,
with me here, whether it's turbulence or whatever,
I'll make sure everyone arrives safely.
info: 采集山莓教学-开启前-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Maelstrom? Danger?
Small problem here! Send them flying—
info: 采集山莓教学-开启前-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Hm? What I mean is...
Your car is really sturdy, being towed behind the big vehicle,
Like a lifeboat - very safe, yep!
